alert.note: Alert for North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 4:19AM CDT until April 10 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Along the Pine Ridge of Northern Nebraska Panhandle, central and southern Niobrara County, and western Converse County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Rain will switch over to snow late tonight, causing areas of snow covered roads by Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
